ygData.subject: Hunting at 25
ygData.msgSnippet: Here is a question then. I ve been groving from 20 to 25 in the lake of ill omen, easy exp, I only die now when...well, I haven t died in quiet a while! The
ygData.messageBody:
Here is a question then. I've been groving from 20 to 25 in the lake of ill omen, easy exp, I only die now when...well, I haven't died in quiet a while! The down side is...bored. Ran a shadow knight from 1-8 just to take a break.
Tonight my lv 25 enchanter will be at Castle Mistmoore for the Halloween bash (Our guild, the Nameless of Norath, on the nameless server, is hosting a server wide raid). I need somewhere interesting and good for growth to hunt. But with enough people to not spend a long time standing around looking for a group. Should I stay in Castle Mistmoore? Or go else where? Or what?

Vroc, Enchanter on the Nameless
_____________________
"The more I learn, o, the less I know
Friend or foe? No, there's only Us"
